Transcript of meeting of the Executive
            Directors of the IBRD and IDA, held on Tuesday, April 08,
            1969 : Zambia - Education Project

abstracts.cdata!:
This partial transcript, from the
            session of the Executive Directors of the International Bank
            for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and International
            Development Association (IDA) held on Tuesday, April 08,
            1969 covers only the discussion on the Education Project for Zambia

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Education Project will
            comprise: (i) the construction, furnishing and equipping of
            9 new secondary schools; and (ii) the improvement,
            construction of, extensions to, and supplementary furnishing
            and equipping of, 56 existing secondary schools, 2 primary
            teacher training colleges, 2 higher teacher training
            colleges and technical colleges.
